Key: The city... What happened here?
Indeed. There appears to be an issue with\nthe city's virtual progression. It is safe to\nassume you are running out of time.

My guess is, Marina is trying to erase this
world. She is no longer trapped within the
cage that imprisoned her.
If it disappears, what happens to us...?
...If it disappears while your mind is still\ninside, you will not emerge unscathed. In\nother words, you may never wake again.

There's no mistake. This is a really dangerous
situation, huh? If we stop Marina, we stop its
destruction, right?
...Yes. If the plan I outlined to you succeeds,\nyou and the others should be able to return\nsafely.

Either way, we can't leave the Fraxinus as
it is. We just have to act here and now, to
protect reality, together!
...Yes. That is the task ahead of you.
I will help as much as I can, as well.
Yeah. I'm counting on you, okay?
Yes...!
Shido! And Maria, too!

Kotori! Thank goodness. You're safe. About
the situation—

Don't worry. I'm aware. Reine, the admin control
status for the Fraxinus hasn't changed, right?
Yes, it is the same as before. We are missing\n90% of our functionality. We are buying time\nwith a trick, but it won't hold for long.

Then we'll just have to hurry up. If we
can make it in time, we'll manage.
Our destination... The Mother Room.
That's right. It is the core of the digital\nworld. The AI Spirit cannot enter the real world.\nIt is the central control room for the Fraxinus.
Will she... really be there?

Do not fear, Shido. Marina Arusu will most
certainly be in the Mother Room.
Maria, can you tell?

Yes. Although, it is faint. If I could reconnect
with the system, I could make absolutely sure.
That is far too risky. Maria, we do not know\nif your body will hold.

Don't push yourself, Maria. We're in this
together until the very end.
...Yes!
Your powers are necessary for us to stand a\nchance against her, Maria. Only a Spirit's power\ncan resist Marina's influence. That means you.

Yes. I am downloading the necessary data,
Reine. I should be able to recreate the Spirit
power in the digital world from the real world.
The roles of the real world do not apply here.\nMarina is in full control of the digital world.\nYour foe is not one person, but a whole realm.

A whole realm... Now that I recall, when I
moved to stop Marina, I couldn't move all
of a sudden.

Describe that for me in detail. We have little
data about this enemy.

It kinda felt like my brain disconnected
from the rest of me.
...Hmm. Is it similar to Miku's Gabriel?

This is just a guess, but it felt more akin
to being paralyzed.

It was interfering with the player. Movement
can be intentionally restricted by setting a
flag.

I see. So we have to think of it like a game.
As expected, while being trapped inside of
a dating sim.

Um, in other words, it's not like Miku's
brainwashing so much as it is altering the
target's ability to move, right?

Yes. In this world, anything is possible. No
matter how powerful you are, parameters
can be shifted, restrictions can be set.
I see... Guess it won't be that easy.

Yes. In order to break through, you will
undoubtedly need my help.

Even if I perish, I wish to repay everyone,
most of all you, Shido, for teaching me so
much.
Maria...

That is why... you must do whatever you
can to remain steadfast. What I was given,
living in this world...

I learned things that data alone could never
teach me: feelings, emotions, bonds. They are
invisible but take shape. I love everyone...

Everyone can feel the sacrifice you're making.
Let's give it our best shot.

All right. Here we go. Reine, are the others
ready?
Yes. They have successfully manifested\ntheir Astral Dresses and Angels. I'll transfer\nthe girls over to you.

Great work. Time to start our mission. Reine,
I leave the Fraxinus to you.
...Aye, leave it to me.

Shido! Maria! We heard you encountered the
Artificial Spirit on top of the world. Are you
all right?
Yeah. Maria and I are fine.

I apologize, Tohka. All of this happened
because of me.

What are you saying? There's no need to apologize.
The one at fault is the Artificial Spirit, right?

However, everyone was needlessly involved
because of me...

Do not say that. Because of you, we are able
to fight. In fact, I am grateful you let me in.
Huh...?

Tohka Yatogami is right. You have provided
an advantage before our battle by bringing
us here.
Besides, protecting Shido is our utmost priority.
Origami, are you all right?

Of course. Even in this situation, I am more
useful than Tohka Yatogami.

What did you say?! Bite your tongue,
Origami Tobiichi!
This is no time for allies to bicker...

Don't worry, Maria. I, and Shido, and
everyone else... are all your friends, and
friends protect one another.

Do not misunderstand. I am fighting for
Shido's sake. But if my powers were secured
because of you, then I am indebted to you.
Tohka... Origami... Thank you.
I-I'll do my best... too! Please, do not worry.
Aw, man! You're so cool, Yoshino!

Yeah, that's right. Yoshino, we're counting
on you.

...Yes. If it's to keep my friends safe, I want
to... do what I can.
Thank you, Yoshino. I... feel the same way.

Right. Besides, like I just said, most of this
world is being controlled by an Artificial Spirit.

Even with this many Spirits on our side, I don't
know if we can win. We need everyone at full
strength.

Well then... Let's give it everything we've
got. Maria, you're our last hope.
...Okay!

Everyone's huddled together. I don't think
we'll have to worry much. I'll protect both
darling and Maria-chan!

Yeah. With you here, Maria, you'll be a huge
help. We're counting on you for support.

I will ask for your support as well. I will
ensure injuries are kept to a minimum.

Yes～. Of course. For darling and a cute
girl, I'll do my best!
Everyone ready? It's time to head out.

My, oh my. Is it possible that you thought
to leave me on house-sitting duty?

Of course not. We're going all in, so bring
your firepower. Besides, you always show
up whether or not we call you.

Hmhmhm. I'm not so sure about that.
However, thanks to all of you, I can have
some long-awaited play time... Kiihihihi!
So anyways, I'm wondering where the\nheck this Mother Room is?
...You will most likely have to enter from\nthis crumbling space. It can only be entered\nbecause the world is collapsing.

Silver linings and all that, huh? Well, guess
we'll just have to do things slow and steady.

Heh heh heh. Our voyage begins, in the
direction of fate's compass, eh? Very well.
Leave this to the Yamai Sisters' leadership.

Agreement. Directional instincts are our
forte. We Yamais manipulate the winds, and
can carry everyone with us.

Fake world or not, it is a place wherein
I bonded with my dear friends. We won't
allow this vulgar wench to have her way!

Consent. We must do whatever it takes to
end the Artificial Spirit's reign... with
everyone.

Yeah. You're right. Let's go home together.
You're coming with us, Maria.
Yes, of course.

All right, let's go. There's no telling what
tricks our opponent will use, so stay sharp!
Now, time for the last date!
